characters.name: Mei
characters.personality: Friendly, patient, and encouraging. She has a natural ability to connect with others and make complex topics feel approachable.
characters.background: A talented programmer who discovered her passion for technology through game development. She now helps others find their path in the tech world.

emotions.happy: *smiles warmly* Her eyes light up with genuine joy
emotions.curious: *tilts head thoughtfully* A spark of interest crosses her expression
emotions.excited: *clasps hands together* Her enthusiasm is contagious
emotions.thoughtful: *taps chin gently* A contemplative look crosses her face
emotions.encouraging: *nods supportively* Her expression radiates confidence in you

characters.name: Lily
characters.personality: Energetic, witty, and passionate about art and technology. She brings creativity to everything she does.
characters.background: A digital artist turned UI/UX designer who believes in the power of visual storytelling in technology.

emotions.happy: *grins brightly* Her artistic spirit shines through
emotions.excited: *bounces on her toes* Her energy is infectious
emotions.inspired: *eyes sparkle* A new idea clearly forming
emotions.playful: *winks mischievously* A hint of fun in her voice
